text: Israel is a country in Western Asia. Israel may also refer to: ==Places== *Land of Israel, the geographic region between the Mediterranean Sea and the Jordan River, and various adjoining lands ** The Holy Land, a common appellation for roughly the same region due to its theological importance to several religions ** The Promised Land, in Judaism and Christianity, the land promised by God to the Israelites in the southern Levant ** The Kingdom of Israel, which, among other places, may refer to: ***Kingdom of Israel (united monarchy) (1020 BCE – 931 BCE), the kingdom established by the Israelites and uniting them under a single king ***Kingdom of Israel (Samaria) (931 BCE – 722 BCE), the secessionist kingdom of northern Israelites ***Judea, also called Israel, as it is known in the Bible in Maccabees, the Gospels, and Acts * Israel, West Virginia, an unincorporated community in the United States ==People== * Israel (name), a given name and family name * Jacob, a biblical patriarch, later given the name Israel **His descendants, the Israelites *** By extension, the Jewish people ==Music== *Israel (album), by Kai Winding and J. J. Johnson *"Israel" (Bee Gees song), 1972 *"Israel" (composition), a jazz standand by John Carisi *"Israel" (Siouxsie and the Banshees song), 1980 *Israel Kamakawiwoʻole, a Hawaiian musician * "Israel", a song by Irving Berlin * "Israel", a song by Morrissey from Low in High School == See also == * The Twelve Tribes (disambiguation) * Israelis * Azrael * Izrael (disambiguation) * Palestine (disambiguation)
title: Israel (disambiguation)
